verses.verse: הַ֥לְלוּ <WH1984> Praise יָ֨הּ ׀ <WH3050> ye the LORD הַֽלְלוּ־ <WH1984> Praise אֵ֥ל <WH410> God בְּקָדְשׁ֑וֹ <WH6944> in his sanctuary הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ <WH1984> praise בִּרְקִ֥יעַ <WH7549> him in the firmament עֻזּֽוֹ׃ <WH5797> of his power
הַֽלְל֥וּהוּ <WH1984> Praise בִגְבוּרֹתָ֑יו <WH1369> him for his mighty acts הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ <WH1984> praise כְּרֹ֣ב <WH7230> him according to his excellent גֻּדְלֽוֹ׃ <WH1433> greatness

הַֽ֭לְלוּהוּ <WH1984> Praise בְּתֵ֣קַע <WH8629> him with the sound שׁוֹפָ֑ר <WH7782> of the trumpet הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ <WH1984> praise בְּנֵ֣בֶל <WH5035> him with the psaltery וְכִנּֽוֹר׃ <WH3658> and harp

הַֽ֭לְלוּהוּ <WH1984> Praise בְתֹ֣ף <WH8596> him with the timbrel וּמָח֑וֹל <WH4234> and dance הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ <WH1984> praise בְּמִנִּ֥ים <WH4482> him with stringed instruments וְעוּגָֽב׃ <WH5748> and organs

הַֽלְל֥וּהוּ <WH1984> Praise בְצִלְצְלֵי־ <WH6767> cymbals שָׁ֑מַע <WH8088> him upon the loud הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ <WH1984> praise בְּֽצִלְצְלֵ֥י <WH6767> cymbals תְרוּעָֽה׃ <WH8643> him upon the high sounding
כֹּ֣ל <WH3605> everything הַ֭נְּשָׁמָה <WH5397> Let every thing that hath breath תְּהַלֵּ֥ל <WH1984> praise יָ֗הּ <WH3050> the LORD הַֽלְלוּ־ <WH1984> Praise יָֽהּ׃ <WH3050> ye the LORD
